translation.value: Choose how often to automatically save your game.[COMMENT: preference screen; should the game autosave]
Choose between auto-saving to a single file, a set number of rolling files, or a new file.[COMMENT: preference screen; you can autosave in multiple files]
Single File[COMMENT: preferences_screen; auto save mode; overwrite a single-file each time]
New File for Every Auto Save[COMMENT: preferences_screen; auto save mode; saves to a new file each time]
3 File Rolling Auto Save[COMMENT: preferences_screen; auto save mode; save to one of three files in sequence]
5 File Rolling Auto Save[COMMENT: preferences_screen; auto save mode; save to one of five files in sequence]
10 File Rolling Auto Save[COMMENT: preferences_screen; auto save mode; save to one of ten files in sequence]
